@PetrochukM Could you please try this patch and see if it resolves the problem?

```
diff --git a/torch/multiprocessing/reductions.py b/torch/multiprocessing/reductions.py
index a346d5693..8b3c40222 100644
--- a/torch/multiprocessing/reductions.py
+++ b/torch/multiprocessing/reductions.py
@@ -173,9 +173,9 @@ def reduce_tensor(tensor):
                  handle,
                  storage_size,
                  tensor.requires_grad,
-                 tensor._backward_hooks))
+                 None))
 
-    metadata = (tensor.storage_offset(), tensor.size(), tensor.stride(), tensor.requires_grad, tensor._backward_hooks)
+    metadata = (tensor.storage_offset(), tensor.size(), tensor.stride(), tensor.requires_grad, None)
     return (rebuild_tensor, (type(tensor), storage, metadata))
 
 
```
